revised 01/18/99; 06/12/00; 01/09/02

CHAPTER 1 — Introduction to Computer Systems

The word computer refers to a system composed of many components. A computer system has both hardware and software components. This chapter discusses these components.

Chapter Topics:

  • Computer Systems.
  • Hardware and Software.
  • Hardware components of a computer system.
  • Software components of a computer system.
  • Networks.
  • World-Wide Web.

QUESTION 1:

What did you think about the movie Monsters, Inc.?
